Uses of Class
simplenlg.framework.NLGModule

  • Packages that use NLGModule 
    Package Description
    simplenlg.aggregation  
    simplenlg.format.english
    The format package currently contains only a single class, a plain text processor for English.
    simplenlg.morphology
    The morphology package contains the processing module that handles the morphology in the SimpleNLG package.
    simplenlg.orthography
    The orthography package contains the processing module that handles the orthography in the SimpleNLG package.
    simplenlg.realiser  
    simplenlg.syntax
    The syntax package contains the processing module that handles the syntax in the SimpleNLG package.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Aggregator
      An Aggregator performs aggregation on clauses, by applying a set of prespecified rules on them and returning the result.
